page.title: 10G.E.C.MATERIALS & PRODUCTS.
page.content: In those days they manufactured compact multiple expansion high speed vertical steam engines at a time when the supply of public electricity was still in its infancy.Currently G.E.C. Turbine Generators has four sites:- Rugby,Larne(N.I.),Stafford and Trafford Park(Manchester).The firm makes large and industrial steam turbine generating plant,including turbines,condensors,and generators. Included in their products are materials such as:-copper,high carbon steel,ferrous and non-ferrous alloys,plastics and other various man-made materials.Their materials come from all over the world,but mainly from the U.K.Their products are installed and producing electricity in very nearly every continent in the world.Their products are transported by road, rail,and cargo ship.
